static GISGEOM_API GisAgfGeometryFactory* GisAgfGeometryFactory::GetPrivateInstance (  GisInt32  numGeometries,
GisInt32  numPositions,
GisInt32  numEnvelopes,
GisInt32  numCurveSegments,
GisInt32  numRings
)  [static]
 

Instantiates an object of this class.

Remarks:
This class is its own factory. This method will return a new, private instance, with any internal object pools tuned to the input parameters.
Parameters:
numGeometries Input Minimum number of geometries to pool.
numPositions Input Minimum number of positions to pool.
numEnvelopes Input Minimum number of envelopes to pool.
numCurveSegments Input Minimum number of curve segments to pool.
numRings Input Minimum number of polygon rings to pool.
Returns:
Returns a GisAgfGeometryFactory object
Comments or suggestions? Send us feedback.
